Name: Grassy Finnish
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix) 2 sugar to 1 water
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
MUDDLE lemongrass in base of shaker.
Add other ingredients and SHAKE with ice.
Review: Like Finland, this drink is clean, green, wooded and safe, but deep down there's plenty of spice.
History: Created in 2003 by Gerard McCurry at Revolution, UK.
